channel.title: Z0mfg help!
channel.description:
i`ve made a new file called laghandler.java i added it and i get this error its only 1 please help me guys..
[code]laghandler.java:7: class LagHandler is public, should be declared in a file name d LagHandler.java public class LagHandler ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Press any key to continue. . .[/code] :mad:

item.title: Z0mfg help!
item.dc:creator: @str1k3r21 str1k3r21
item.description:
@str1k3r21 wrote:

Well idk what the probleme is but I have mine that works fine for my server and no lagg.Here’s Source

[code]
// This resets server every 30 mins to stop lag
// Not sure if this works very well but on my server No LAGG
// Made by Str1k3r21 Dont leach!
import java.io.*;

public class antilag
{

public int ResetTimer = 0;

public void resetserver()
{
misc.println(“Reseting Server.”);
misc.println(“Saving all games…”);
PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true;
misc.println(“Game Succesfully Saved For All Players”);
ResetTimer = 0;
closeListener();
runserver();
}
public void process()
{
ResetTimer += 1;
if(ResetTimer >= 9999999)
{
resetserver();
}
}

public void runserver()
{
try
{
String run = “runserver.bat”;
String xstr = “./”+run;
Runtime.getRuntime().exec(xstr);
}
catch (IOException ioe)
{
ioe.printStackTrace();
}
}

public void closeListener()
{
try {
server.shutdownClientHandler = true;
if(server.clientListener != null) server.clientListener.close();
server.clientListener = null;
}
catch(java.lang.Exception __ex)
{
__ex.printStackTrace();
}
}
}[/code]

Read full topic
